blog_: How to maximize on your resort stay
blog_title: No place is 100% secure. That's why we advice our guests to wear a zipped trouser or sweater so as to keep portable devices safe while exporing the city. When entering a new pace, ensure you have done research, and let someone you know have your location. Hell, you can even share your location using apps like Google Maps.

blog_: How to enjoy your vacation on  budget
blog_title: Food is a basic need. But GOOD food is a necessity. Here in the resort, not only do we offer splendid meals, but we do offer a variety. From the Nile perch to the highland cabbage, our top chefs will prepare a meal that you can never get enough of... Aah, I can't. Just experience wit us the crazy meals offered.

Sirville Lake Elementaita Lodge is distinctively located at the shoreline of the shallow hyper saline lake- Lake Elementaita, in the Great Rift Valley; a home for over 400 species of birds. While at the lodge, guests will get to enjoy the unparalleled values and gracious hospitality at all levels.
